email_body: Jay, Can you set up one more simulated account with access to all products for the west desk. Thank you, Phillip Allen -----Original Message----- From: Webb, Jay Sent: Monday, July 16, 2001 4:58 PM To: Shively, Hunter S. Cc: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: simulation environment Hunter, The simulation url is https://simweb0.eolsim.com Your accounts are: access to all: simtrader1 access to us gas only: simtrader3, simtrader4 Phillip's accounts are: access to all: simtrader2 access to us gas only: simtrader5, simtrader6 In each case, the password is the same as the username. Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks! --jay
